title: Inverted y font
content:
hey people, I need any free font with an inverted "y", like this one that I made in photoshop based on triplex bold font:   
 ![invertedy](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142631im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25861.gif)   
   
does anyone know???
author: primavera

comments.content: The question why a font? How many words are you using that require a reverse lower case y?
sorry... english is not my native language

Change the y in any font using font software (like Fontographer), or replace it the way you did in the sample if you are only doing a few words.   
   
There are very few fonts with that kind of y, and you probably would not like them. Most look like the printing of children.
